FwkSenCnt.MEANING: generous kindness from a position of strength

ExCnt.EX: When once an enemy gave up they would treat him with princely magnanimity .
They hailed the magnanimity of the government in releasing some political detainees and called for the release of all political detainees .

` In some ways , I regret losing my opportunity to perform this piece , but I do n't begrudge you yours .' She swept magnificently from the hall , clearly aware of , and gratified by , her own gracious magnanimity .
`` Today , '' he told her with the beaming magnanimity of a television game-show host , `` is your lucky day . ''
